"Hey Pichu, you alright?" Roy asked as he knelt and helped the electric mouse up.

"Pichu Pichu Pi chu!" Pichu exclaimed as he held out his paw.

"Hmm? What's---" Roy began as he looked at the small figure in Pichu's paw.

"Roy, please you gotta help me!" Young Link called.

"Young Link?" Roy asked blinking in surprise.

Before the trio could say anything further they heard Master Hand's voice call for Pichu. The electric type had another match to get to.
"Pichu pi pichu..." Pichu began as he looked down at Young Link.

Roy held out a hand as he looked to Pichu. "I'll take care of him. Good luck in your next match, little guy." He said.
Pichu nodded as he gently slid Young Link from his paw to Roy's waiting hand. The electric mouse scurried off to his next battle. Roy looked at Young Link, still slightly in shock to what was going on. "How did you end up so, you know, tiny?" Roy asked.

"That's the thing. Pichu and I don't know. We had just finished a match against Ganondorf and Mewtwo. Next thing we knew I was feeling sick. Then this." Young Link replied.

Roy nodded slightly. "Let's head over to Dr. Mario's and see if he can help." He said as he slowly stood. He held his hand at chest level as he walked to the medical office. Young Link leaned back on his arms as he sat on Roy's palm.
